page.title: 15TOURISTS
page.content: Many people visit Edale to walk on the Pennine Way and enjoy the scenery.12 residents serve meals and refreshments ,13 have campers on their land.There are 9 places for visitors to have bed and breakfast.The Youth Hostel at Nether Booth can accomodate 140 people.36% are individuals and 64% are groups,mostly schools.Visitors may stay there for activity holidays education,training courses,conferences and freindly weekends 25,000 people stayed there last year.Champion House is a Diocesan Youth Centre at Grinds - brook it can accomodate 39 people for youth training.It caters for schools, youth clubs,Youth Training Scheme apprentices.The groups are taken on outdoor activites.At a busy bank holiday.550-600 people could be staying in Edale as well as the 350 residents.
